plugin.name: efence
plugin.description: This element converts a stream of normal GStreamer buffers into a stream of buffers that are allocated in such a way that out-of-bounds access to data in the buffer is more likely to cause segmentation faults. This allocation method is very similar to the debugging tool "Electric Fence".

element.name: efence

element.author: David A. Schleef <ds@schleef.org>
